ingredients.ingredient: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker pie crust

cookingTips: Whip the heavy cream to medium peaks before folding into pudding for a lighter, fluffier filling
Spread jam on the crust before adding filling to create a flavor barrier that prevents sogginess
Top with berries just before serving to maintain their freshness and texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the baker on creating a light custard filling and preventing a soggy crust with proper assembly technique.
